thread.title: BRIEF-Cogentix Medical Sees FY 2017 Revenue Up About 9 Percent

title: BRIEF-Cogentix Medical Sees FY 2017 Revenue Up About 9 Percent
text:
February 6, 2018 / 12:13 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Cogentix Medical Sees FY 2017 Revenue Up About 9 Percent Reuters Staff 
* COGENTIX MEDICAL ANNOUNCES 17% PRELIMINARY FOURTH QUARTER 2017 YEAR-OVER-YEAR REVENUE GROWTH * SEES FY 2017 REVENUE $56.3 MILLION * SEES FY 2017 REVENUE UP ABOUT 9 PERCENT 
* COGENTIX MEDICAL-‍PRELIMINARY AND UNAUDITED REVENUE FOR Q4 2017 IS EXPECTED TO BE $15.5 MILLION, OR ABOUT 17% GROWTH COMPARED TO SAME PERIOD IN 2016​ 
* ‍UROLOGY REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE $49.3 MILLION FOR FULL YEAR OF 2017, REFLECTING GROWTH OF APPROXIMATELY 10% OVER 2016​ 
* FY2017 REVENUE VIEW $55.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $15.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
